hints.content:
$\pink{30}$ flowers is the same as $\pink{3\text{ groups of ten}}$ flowers.

There are $\blue9$ garden beds.

Total number of flowers:  
$\begin{align}&\blue9\times\pink{3\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\purple{27\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\purple{270}\end{align}$

question.content:
A gardener is planting flowers. He plants $30$ flowers in each garden bed. He plants $9$ garden beds.  


**How many flowers does the gardener plant in all?**

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] flowers
